name: Libra
description: Astrofolio taps into current cultural trends by referencing memes and popular narratives within the crypto space. It allows users to speculate on or invest in cryptocurrencies based on astrological signs, which is a novel approach in the crypto space. This fusion of ancient wisdom with modern financial technology creates a unique niche for enthusiasts of both fields.
